TYPE OF RMM: Glove bag (ventilated or kept under negative pressure)
Low specification glove box-single chamber, simple access doors, unsafe change glove, single HEPA filtered, manual cleaning / filter change
Medium specification glove box – two or more chambers, stainless steel, safe filter change, single or double HEPA filtered, interlocked air locks, manual cleaning / filter change, etc
High specification glove box – see above, including negative pressure, air flow and filter condition continuously monitored, automatic emergency air extraction, waste disposal ports, etc
Wetting at the point of release
Partial segregation with ventilation and filtration of recirculated air
Complete segregation with ventilation and filtration of recirculated air
Downward laminar flow booth with no screens
Downward laminar flow booth using partial screen
Downward laminar flow booth using partial screen fitted with glove ports
Downward laminar flow booth using full screen fitted with glove ports
With  5-10 air renewals (not recirculated), air filtered with H14, regular maintenance of filters, negative pressure (15-20 Pa)
Without  5-10 air renewals (not recirculated), air filtered with H14, regular maintenance of filters, negative pressure (15-20 Pa)
P3/ FFP3 or N99 or P100
